name: Market Gossip
description: The market buzzes with rumors. Perhaps you can learn something useful.

settlement.narrative: You mingle with the merchants and servants, trying to gather information.

success.narrative: The merchants speak freely. You learn valuable information about the palace intrigue.

partial_success.narrative: You overhear some useful tidbits, but nothing concrete.

failure.narrative: The merchants are suspicious. You leave empty-handed.

critical_failure.narrative: Your questions draw unwanted attention. Someone is now watching you.
